'''Granite stairs''' are a [[granite]] variant of [[stairs]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Granite stairs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Granite Stairs
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|item=1
|link=none
|horizontal=1
}}

=== Natural generation ===
Granite stairs generate as part of [[Village#Desert|desert village]]s.
